head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SMITH, ROBERT ALLEN,

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SMITH, ROBERT ALLEN,

block.p: SMITH-Robert Allen, 64. Of Alexandria, VA. On Dec. 3. Beloved husband of Carmen Angeles Smith, devoted brother of Roslyn S. Ringel and loyal brother-in-law of William Ringel of Kew Gardens, N.Y. Loving stepfather of Jorge Santiago, Ivan & Wilson Gutierrez & their family of San Juan, Puerto Rico. A Masonic service will be held at the Everly-Wheatley Funeral Home, 1500 W. Braddock Rd, Alexandria, VA., Wednesday December 6, at 7:30 PM. Funeral services will be held on Thursday, December 7, at 10 AM, at Christ Church, 118 N. Washington St, Alexandria, VA. Interment in San Juan, Puerto Rico. In lieu of flowers, please send donations to the Hospice of Northern Virginia, 6565 Arlington Boulevard, Suite 500, Falls Church, VA. 22042.

Braddock Rd, Alexandria, VA., Wednesday December 6, at 7:30 PM. Funeral services will be held on Thursday, December 7, at 10 AM, at Christ Church, 118 N. Washington St, Alexandria, VA. Interment in San Juan, Puerto Rico. In lieu of flowers, please send donations to the Hospice of Northern Virginia, 6565 Arlington Boulevard, Suite 500, Falls Church, VA. 22042.
